title: See the Best Street Style From London Fashion Week
text:
After New York Fashion Week came to an end, the fashion scene relocated across the pond for the European shows. First up: London, home of Victoria Beckham and her sunglasses, Burberry plaid, and Simone Rocha, our Queen of the New Weird.

While New Yorkers cling to the safety of an all-black ensemble and Parisians push “understated” to new lows, you can always count on Londoners to do something daring. That goes double for Fashion Week, when the runway shows compete with the displays attendees put on in the streets. Like Vivienne Westwood and her Brit-punks before them, this season’s crop of trendsetters donned clashing prints, bold colors, and mixed-media ensembles. Our street-style photographer, Nicky Zeng, was there to document the best looks. Scroll down for the complete set from September 15.
description: Nicky Zeng photographs the coolest, wildest, and most stylish looks at London Fashion Week Spring 2020 for the Cut.
